channel.title: CVE Feed for clastix -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for clastix -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-42480|2024-08-12T17:55:54.373Z -- clastix -- kamaji
item.description: Kamaji is the Hosted Control Plane Manager for Kubernetes. In versions 1.0.0 and earlier, Kamaji uses an "open at the top" range definition in RBAC for etcd roles leading to some TCPs API servers being able to read, write, and delete the data of other control planes. This vulnerability is fixed in edge-24.8.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-42480|2024-08-12T15:21:52.010Z -- clastix -- kamaji
item.description: Kamaji is the Hosted Control Plane Manager for Kubernetes. In versions 1.0.0 and earlier, Kamaji uses an "open at the top" range definition in RBAC for etcd roles leading to some TCPs API servers being able to read, write, and delete the data of other control planes. This vulnerability is fixed in edge-24.8.2.
